dashboard.description:
Flink Metrics (with Kafka) on K8S
This dashboard if for monitoring Flink Applications Performance. It includes metrics like record count, latency. It also has kafka parameters like bytes count. Moreover, it has k8s memory, CPU and Network statistics.

panels.description:
Current - Records In
It's the rate over last 2 minutes.
panels.title: Records In (Current)

panels.description: Records out per minute is equal to Records in per minute in Sink
panels.title: Records in - Sink
Kafka - Bytes in rate per topic

panels.description:
Current - Records Out
It's the rate over last 2 minutes.

Records Out for the application is equal to records in for the sink
panels.title: Records In - Sink (Current)
Kafka - Bytes out rate per topic

panels.description: JVM Memory Direct Buffers vs JVM Memory Total Capacity of Direct Buffers

panels.description: JVM Memory Heap Used vs JVM Memory Heap Max
panels.title: TaskManager Heap Memory

panels.description: It's the rate over last 2 minutes.
panels.title: CPU Load - JobManager

panels.description: It's the rate over last 2 minutes.
panels.title: CPU Load - TaskManager
